articles.title: Haiti gang demands US$17M for kidnapped Canadian, American missionaries: reports - Globalnews.ca
articles.description: A wave of kidnappings prompted a protest strike that shuttered businesses, schools and public transportation in a new blow to Haiti's anemic economy.
articles.content:
A gang that kidnapped 17 members of a U,S.-based missionary group has demanded a $17 million ransom for them, according to Haiti’s justice minister, as quoted by the Wall Street Journal.

articles.title: FDA planning to allow mix-and-match Covid-19 vaccine boosters - CNN
articles.description: The US Food and Drug Administration is planning on allowing Americans to receive a different coronavirus vaccine for their booster shots than their original dose, according to two sources familiar with the current thinking inside the agency.
